# tf.contrib.metrics.confusion_matrix

``` python
tf.contrib.metrics.confusion_matrix(
    labels,
    predictions,
    num_classes=None,
    dtype=tf.int32,
    name=None,
    weights=None
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/confusion_matrix_ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/confusion_matrix_ops.py).

See the guide: [Metrics (contrib) > Metric `Ops`](../../../../../api_guides/python/contrib.metrics#Metric_Ops_)

Deprecated. Use tf.confusion_matrix instead.
